snippet: The president said that he contacted Sandra Fluke to set an example for his daughters, and he declined to speak on the sincerity of Rush Limbaugh’s apology.
abstract: Pres Obama, speaking publicly for the first time about Rush Limbaugh's slur of law student Sandra Fluke on his radio show, says he called her in part to set an example for his daughters; declines to speak on the sincerity of Limbaugh's apology.
lead_paragraph: The president said that he contacted Sandra Fluke to set an example for his daughters, and he declined to speak on the sincerity of Rush Limbaugh’s apology.

headline.seo: Obama Says He Called Law Student for His Girls
headline.main: Obama’s Call Was a Lesson for His Girls
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Call Was a Lesson For His Girls

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
